resources.string: Choose an application to select Spoiler
To use this app, select it from the list of apps to fetch images from in Discord by clicking this button when attaching a file.

plurals.name: cache_info_files
plurals.item: You have %d file in your cache.
You have %d files in your cache.

resources.string: The cache is using %d%s of space.
Image showing the location of the button you need to press within Discord
